name: Drawing for a Wine Cooler
description: Drawing for a Wine Cooler; Attributed to Jean-Guillaume Miotte (French, 1746 - 1810); Paris, France; about 1785 - 1790; Pen and black ink and gray wash; 36.7 x 31.8 cm (14 7/16 x 12 1/2 in.); 79.GA.182; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Drawing for a Wine Cooler
medium: Pen and black ink and gray wash
